Start Screen Recording

Source: R/start_screen_record.R
start_screen_record.Rd

Start Screen Recording

start_screen_record(device = guess_recording_device(),
  outfile = tempfile(fileext = ".avi"), args = NULL,
  overwrite = TRUE, audio = FALSE, video = TRUE, run = TRUE,
  verbose = TRUE, show_std_err = FALSE)

Arguments

device

Device to record on
outfile

Output filename (with extension)
args

additional arguments to pass to ffmpeg
overwrite

Should output file be overwritten if it exists?
audio

Should audio be captured
video

Should video be captured
run

Should the code be run (default TRUE) or simply have the arguments printed (FALSE)
verbose

print diagnostic messages
show_std_err

Show STDERR output, passed to sys::exec_background.

Value

A list of the process ID and output file.

Note

https://trac.ffmpeg.org/wiki/Capture/Desktop

Examples

res = Sys.which("ffmpeg")
stopifnot(res != "")
print(list_output_devices())
#>   capabilities       device                      description
#> 1            D avfoundation        AVFoundation input device
#> 2            D        lavfi Libavfilter virtual input device
start_screen_record(run = FALSE)
#> [1] "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpQMiE5j/filedbd56d4a2c1f.avi -f avfoundation -i 1"
#> [1] "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpQMiE5j/filedbd56d4a2c1f.avi"
#> [2] "-f"                                                                               
#> [3] "avfoundation"                                                                     
#> [4] "-i"                                                                               
#> [5] "1"                                                                                
out = start_screen_record(audio = FALSE, show_std_err = TRUE)
#> pid is 56360
Sys.sleep(4)
res = end_screen_record(out$pid)
stopifnot(file.exists(out$outfile))
if (interactive()) {
   sys::exec_wait("open", args = out$outfile)
}
